name: Rootscaped: Overgrown, Undertended
description:
Growing up is hard. Sometimes you forget your roots. 

You are a hard working botanical scientist who has been working for a corporation you know is untrustworthy, but you have bills to pay.

Your sister is an environmental activist, but she doesn’t understand the real world. 

At least that’s what you tell yourself. What can one person really do for the environment?

You’ve come home after a week of tough negotiation and board meetings. 

Your home feels somehow different. 

Exploring your house and finding your way out, can you rediscover your soul and again find your roots?
